body: I have encounter the same problem, It seems that esquery@1.4.1 cause this problem, Currently I lock the version 1.4.0 first, Waiting a better solution :)
We're encountering the same problem. Can confirm that `esquery@1.4.1` is the problem-child here.

issue.title: [BUG] Typescript ESlint throws "Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'type')" error.
issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
When running typescript-eslint, a type error is thrown.

**To Reproduce**
Run the typescript engine against any file.

**Expected behavior**
The execution should succeed as normal

**Screenshots**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4054488/219260606-d6b73ecf-fb56-46d4-ac8b-88f9550ac709.png)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Any
 - Scanner Version Any

**Additional context**

"Workaround": None currently known

"Urgency": How severe is this problem? "Business stopping" vs "Not business-stopping".

body:
I get the error, but only with certain lint rules. Specifically only with [`sonarjs/no-one-iteration-loop`](https://github.com/SonarSource/eslint-plugin-sonarjs/blob/master/src/rules/no-one-iteration-loop.ts), when run from the CLI or testing directly with the `ESLint` class (even testing against an empty string).

I can run all of my other rule configs for `eslint`, `eslint-plugin-jest`, `eslint-plugin-jsdoc`, `eslint-plugin-n`, `eslint-plugin-playwright`, `eslint-plugin-promise`, `eslint-plugin-sonarjs`, and `eslint-plugin-unicorn` without issues.
I'm seeing it when we run typescript rules specifically.

As a stopgap measure, edit package-lock.json as follows and `npm i` again to fix it.

```diff
...
- "esquery": "^1.4.1",
+ "esquery": "^1.4.0",
...
"node_modules/esquery": {
-    "version": "1.4.1",
-    "resolved": "https://registry.npmjs.org/esquery/-/esquery-1.4.1.tgz",
-    "integrity": "sha512-3ZggxvMv5EEY1ssUVyHSVt0oPreyBfbUi1XikJVfjFiBeBDLdrb0IWoDiEwqT/2sUQi0TGaWtFhOGDD8RTpXgQ==",
+    "version": "1.4.0",
+    "resolved": "https://registry.npmjs.org/esquery/-/esquery-1.4.0.tgz",
+    "integrity": "sha512-cCDispWt5vHHtwMY2YrAQ4ibFkAL8RbH5YGBnZBc90MolvvfkkQcJro/aZiAQUlQ3qgrYS6D6v8Gc5G5CQsc9w==",
      "dev": true,
      "dependencies": {
        "estraverse": "^5.1.0"
      },
      "engines": {
        "node": ">=0.10"
      }
    },
...
```

rename.from: Bug: esquery 1.4.1 release seems to break esquery
rename.to: Bug: esquery 1.4.1 release seems to break eslint

body: Could someone maybe create a small reproducible example for the team to have a better look?
